head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Bronx: Man Is Charged In Fatal Attack

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Bronx: Man Is Charged In Fatal Attack
hedline.hl2: Bronx: Man Is Charged in Fatal Attack

abstract.p: Lee Ruffin is charged with murder in fatal stabbing of man in New York City; victim has not been identified (S)

block.p: A man has been charged with fatally stabbing a fellow resident of an apartment building run by a nonprofit group in Morrisania, the police said yesterday. The man, Lee Ruffin, 29, of the Bronx, was charged with murder, the police said. He is accused of repeatedly stabbing an unidentified 53-year-old man shortly before 4 a.m. on Sunday at Webster House, at 1075 Webster Avenue, the police said. The building is operated by Volunteers of America under an agreement with the city.
